pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - CasinoTravelShoppe's Commitment to Your Privacy CasinoTravelShoppe Home About Us Tours Contact CasinoTravelShoppe Privacy Policy This Privacy Policy describes how CasinoTravelShoppe ("we," "us," or our") collects, uses, and discloses your personal information when you use our website (the "Website"). It also describes the choices you have associated with your personal information. Collection of Personal Information We collect several different types of personal information for various purposes to provide and improve our Service to you. The personal information we collect may include: **Contact Information:** Name, email address, phone number, and mailing address. **Usage Data:** Information about your activity on the Website, such as browsing history, search history, IP address, device type, and operating system. **Information Collected from Third Parties:** We may collect information about you from third-party sources, such as social media platforms or travel booking websites. This information may include your name, email address, demographic information, and travel preferences. Use of Personal Information We use the personal information we collect for various purposes, including: **To provide and maintain the Website:** We use your personal information to operate and maintain the Website, deliver content, and send you administrative communications. **To personalize your experience:** We use your personal information to personalize your experience on the Website, such as recommending travel packages or deals that may interest you. **To improve our Service:** We use your personal information to improve our offerings and the Website's functionality. **To send you marketing and promotional communications:** We may use your personal information to send you marketing and promotional communications, such as newsletters or offers for travel packages. You can opt-out of receiving these communications at any time. **To comply with legal obligations:** We may use your personal information to comply with applicable laws and regulations. Disclosure of Personal Information We may disclose your personal information to third parties in the following circumstances: **Service Providers:** We may share your personal information with third-party service providers who perform services on our behalf, such as website hosting, data analysis, or marketing. **Legal Requirements:** We may disclose your personal information to comply with a legal obligation, such as a subpoena, court order, or government request. **Business Transactions:** We may disclose your personal information in connection with a merger, acquisition, or other business transaction. The CasinoTravelShoppe website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline Our Promise At CasinoTravelShoppe, we are promoting premium casino tours package. Legal Disclaimers Privacy Policy Terms & Conditions

pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions - CasinoTravelShoppe's Agreement for Casino Tour Packages CasinoTravelShoppe Home About Us Tours Contact Terms and Conditions Welcome to CasinoTravelShoppe's Terms and Conditions. These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of CasinoTravelShoppe's website and services, including our expertly curated casino tour packages across Australia. 1. Acceptance of Terms By accessing and using our website or booking our services, you agree to these terms and conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you may not use our website or services. 2. Booking and Payments To book a casino tour package, you must provide accurate and complete information. Payments are required in advance to confirm your booking. We accept various payment methods, and all transactions are secure. 3. Cancellations and Refunds Cancellations made within a specified period may be eligible for a refund, subject to our cancellation policy. Refunds are processed according to the original payment method. 4. Responsibilities and Liabilities While we strive to provide accurate information and excellent service, we are not responsible for any inaccuracies, delays, or losses resulting from factors beyond our control, including but not limited to weather conditions or third-party actions. 5. Privacy and Security Your privacy is important to us. We handle your personal information in accordance with our privacy policy. We implement reasonable security measures to protect your data, but we cannot guarantee complete security. 6. Modifications to Terms We reserve the right to modify these terms and conditions at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our website. It is your responsibility to review these terms periodically for updates. The CasinoTravelShoppe website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline Our Promise At CasinoTravelShoppe, we are promoting premium casino tours package. Legal Disclaimers Privacy Policy Terms & Conditions
